entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain this afternoon. Blowing snow late this morning. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then west 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
